text: Moshi anata gataga, ryōnin no hakyoku o osorerunaraba, otoko no ichizoku kara hitori no chōtei-sha o, mata on'na no ichizoku karamo hitori no chōtei-sha o age nasai. Ryōnin ga moshi wakai o nozomunaraba, arrā wa ryōnin no ma o yūwa sa reyou. Hontōni arrā wa, zenchi ni shite nanigoto ni mo tsūgyō shite ora reru
